Sentencas: High-power density and high durability are the main targets for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) development at Forschungszentrum Julich.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Power density has been further increased by variation of the material composition of perovskite-based cathodes (Sr content, Co content, substoichiometry) and by optimization of the diffusion barrier (Gd-substituted ceria) between an electrolyte and a cathode.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The application of dense diffusion barrier layers significantly improved the performance.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The associated avoidance of SrZrO3 formation, however, contributed only to a small extent to the improvement of durability of SOFCs with LSCF cathodes.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The redox stability of anode-supported SOFCs has been addressed in two ways: (a) conventional Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia anode substrates have been investigated to explore the limits of re-oxidation and to determine the degree of oxidation at which no damages occur.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: (b) Alternative anodes and anode substrates are under development, which basically consist of mixed-conducting ceramics.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Avoiding the high amount of nickel decreases the probability of failure, but does not automatically lead to redox-stable anodes.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The differences in the materials' properties of such ceramics in oxidizing and reducing environment are addressed.
Titulo: Materials development for advanced planar solid oxide fuel cells
